summary: The Department of the Interior oversees energy production on federal lands, and is responsible for ensuring that companies pay a fair return for accessing federal energy resources. We testified on many ways that Interior could better manage these resources. (In fact, we put Interior’s management of federal oil and gas resources on our High Risk List in 2011.) For example, in the past we recommended...
title: Federal Energy Development: Challenges to Ensuring a Fair Return for Federal Energy Resources
